import React,{useEffect,useReducer,useContext}from"react";import reducer from"../context/initial_reducer";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const initialState={railwayInfo:{railway_zone:null,railway_division:null},zoneAndDivisionData:null,zoneAndDivisionLoading:false,zoneAndDivisionError:false};const InitialContext=/*#__PURE__*/React.createContext();export const InitialProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[state,dispatch]=useReducer(reducer,initialState);const zoneAndDivisionInfo=async()=>{dispatch({type:"GET_ZONE_AND_DIVISION_INFO_BEGIN"});try{// https://railwaymcq.com/ohe/location_maintenance_api.php
const response=await fetch("https://railwaymcq.com/ohe/zone_division_api.php");const data=await response.json();dispatch({type:"GET_ZONE_AND_DIVISION_INFO_SUCCESS",payload:data});}catch(error){dispatch({type:"GET_ZONE_AND_DIVISION_INFO_ERROR"});}};useEffect(()=>{zoneAndDivisionInfo();},[]);const SetZoneAndDivision=function(value){let type=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"";if(type==="RAILWAY_ZONE"){dispatch({type:"ZONE",payload:{value}});}if(type==="RAILWAY_DIVISION"){dispatch({type:"DIVISION",payload:{value}});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InitialContext.Provider,{value:{...state,zoneAndDivisionInfo,SetZoneAndDivision},children:children});};export const useInitialContext=()=>{return useContext(InitialContext);};
